scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf extension/**/*.js && rm -rf dist/
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/* && npm run zip && npm run zip-src
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run webpack -- --mode development --watch" "npm run webext"
scripts.zip-src: mkdir -p dist/ && zip -r dist/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version-src.zip * -x .gitignore .git/\* extension/\*\*/\*.js node_modules/\* dist/\*
